short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It helps merge Pull Request on the GitHub when project uses Shipkit

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It helps merge Pull Request on the GitHub. A lot of Continuous Integration tools or workflows use a syntax in commit messages like [ci skip], [ci skip-release] and others to control build execution. To avoid mistakes this simple extension add a few buttons on the GitHub when you merge the Pull Request.
